name: zk-wordle
description: Wordle game implemented using the Zero-Knowledge Proofs

scripts.compile: circom circuits/wordle.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c --output circuits/compiled && cd circuits && snarkjs groth16 setup compiled/wordle.r1cs powers-of-tau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_08.ptau compiled/wordle_0000.zkey
scripts.phase2: cd circuits/compiled && snarkjs zkey contribute wordle_0000.zkey wordle_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor Name' -v && snarkjs zkey contribute wordle_0001.zkey wordle_0002.zkey --name='Second contribution Name' -v -e='Another random entropy'
